action.content:
Recommend movies similar to the given list of movies.

Q: Find a movie similar to Star Wars Episode IV - A New Hope, Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade, Star Wars Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back, The Big Lebowski:
Options:
(A) Tetsuo
(B) the Ironman
(C) The Princess Bride
(D) The Barkley Marathons The Race That Eats Its Young
(E) Bug
A: (C)

Q: Find a movie similar to Twister, The Silence of the Lambs, Independence Day, Braveheart:
Options:
(A) They Shoot Horses
(B) Don't They
(C) Forrest Gump
(D) The Salton Sea
(E) Extreme Days
A: (C)

Q: Find a movie similar to Minority Report, Total Recall, Inside Out, Forrest Gump:
Options:
(A) Phenomena
(B) Lilting
(C) Catwoman
(D) Edge of Tomorrow
A: (D)

Q: Find a movie similar to Terminator 2 Judgment Day, Aladdin, The Shawshank Redemption, The Lion King:
Options:
(A) Iron Man & Hulk Heroes United
(B) Schindler's List
(C) Sherlock Jr
(D) Lilya 4-Ever
A:
action.label: context

action.content:
Q: Find a movie similar to The Matrix, The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King, The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers, The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring:
Options:
(A) The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
(B) The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
(C) The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
(D) The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
A: (A), (B), (C), (D) - all correct options are the same movie, so I'll just pick one: A) The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King||
action.label: response
